import axios from"axios";import{useHistory}from"react-router-dom";import{useLocation}from'react-router';import queryString from'query-string';var Confirmation=function Confirmation(){// redirecting traffic
var history=useHistory();console.log("THIS PATH IS WORKING",window.location.pathname);var location=useLocation();console.log("queryString.parse: ",queryString.parse(location.search)._id);var token=window.location.pathname.replace("/confirmation/","");var id=queryString.parse(location.search)._id;axios.post("/confirmation",{token:token,id:id}).then(function(res){history.push("/user/home");window.location.reload();});};export default Confirmation;
